task.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Shake
task.shortdesc: A delicious breakfast shake that will satisfy your hunger and cure your sweet tooth! You'll need a blender and measuring cups/spoons. Yields two servings!!

taskbody.context:
Ingredients you will need
2 large overripe bananas, peeled and sliced
1 cup milk
¾ cup ice
¼ cup creamy peanut butter
2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder
½ teaspoon vanilla extract

substep.cmd: Add all ingredients to the blender.
